description: Try our easy to follow Prawn, Berry, Melon & Feta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn salad,Pescatarian,Blueberry,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Christmas,Wheat free,Watermelon
name: Prawn, Berry, Melon & Feta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 24 large green prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a barbecue hotplate or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Place prawns in a bowl and drizzle with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Cook for 3 minutes on each side or until charred and cooked through. Transfer to a plate.
Place lettuce in a bowl. Using a spoon, scoop watermelon into bowl with lettuce. Add prawns, blueberries, mint and feta.
To make the dressing, whisk oil, lime juice and horseradish together in a jug. Drizzle over salad before serving.
